ADC_ADMIN Body

Implementation of methods to administer ADC rules and related metadata.

Author

Juergen Sieben, ConDeS GmbH

Type definitions
id_map_t

PL/SQL table for mapping old IDs to new ones. Used when importing rule groups.

Private Methods
create_decision_table
procedure create_decision_table(
p_crg_id in adc_rule_groups.crg_id%type
)

Method to generate the decision table logic for an ADC rule group.  Result is persisted in column <Tables.ADC_RULE_GROUPS>.CRG_DECISION_TABLE.

Parameter
p_crg_id
in adc_rule_groups.crg_id%type

Rule group ID

create_initialization_code
function create_initialization_code(
p_crg_id in adc_rule_groups.crg_id%type
)
return varchar2

Method to generate initialization code that copies initial page item values to the session state.

Is used to copy initial values into the session state during page rendering. This is required to assure that any rule that is based on certain session state values is processed at initialization time.

Parameter
p_crg_id
in adc_rule_groups.crg_id%type

Rule group ID

Returns

Anonymous PL/SQL block that copies the actual session state values into the session state

get_key
procedure get_key(
p_key in out nocopy binary_integer
)

Method to retrive a new primary key if not present. If P_KEY is NULL, a new sequence key is provided.

Parameter
p_key
in out nocopy binary_integer

Key to set

mark_number_date_required_fields
procedure mark_number_date_required_fields(
p_crg_id in adc_rule_groups.crg_id%type
)

Mark any item with a conversion or mandatory as required to enable ADC to dynamically validate the format.  Mark any item with a required label as mandatory to dynamically check for NOT NULL.

Parameters
p_crg_id
in adc_rule_groups.crg_id%type

mark_rule_condition_items
procedure mark_rule_condition_items(
p_crg_id in adc_rule_groups.crg_id%type,
p_new_condition in adc_rules.cru_condition%type default null
)

Mark any page item that is referenced in a technical rule condition as required.  Method evaluates existing and newly added rule conditions.

Parameters
p_crg_id
in adc_rule_groups.crg_id%type

Rule group ID

p_new_condition
in adc_rules.cru_condition%type

Optional. If a new rule is created, the new rule condition must be obeyed as well

mark_auto_validate_fields
procedure mark_auto_validate_fields(
p_crg_id in adc_rule_groups.crg_id%type
)

Mark any item that is referenced in action type VALIDATE_ITEMS and store the validation method name with the item.

Parameters
p_crg_id
in adc_rule_groups.crg_id%type

maintain_additional_items
procedure maintain_additional_items(
p_crg_id in adc_rule_groups.crg_id%type
)

Method checks additional fields against required fields. If a n additional field is marked as required, it is removed from the additional fields set.  If the additional fields rule action has no field to add, it gets removed from the rule

Parameters
p_crg_id
in adc_rule_groups.crg_id%type

Rule group ID

remove_irrelevant_fields
procedure remove_irrelevant_fields(
p_crg_id in adc_rule_groups.crg_id%type
)

Remove any item that is

  • irrelevant and

  • erroneus (fi not existing anymore) and

  • not referenced by rule actions

Parameters
p_crg_id
in adc_rule_groups.crg_id%type

Rule group ID

harmonize_adc_page_item
procedure harmonize_adc_page_item(
p_crg_id in adc_rule_groups.crg_id%type,
p_new_condition in adc_rules.cru_condition%type default null
)

Method to harmonize Tables.ADC_PAGE_ITEMS against APEX Data Dictionary.

If a rule group changes, all rules and page elements are checked against each other.  The resulting values are used as the basis for a single rule.  Additionally, this method is called if a new rule is created to check whether the condition is syntactically plausible. Therefore, the new condition (which is not stored in the tables yet) must be added to identify any new page items referenced within this rule.

Attention

Method removes non existing page items from the table and deletes any rule actions attached to these page items!

Parameters
p_crg_id
in adc_rule_groups.crg_id%type

Rule group ID

p_new_condition
in adc_rules.cru_condition%type

Optional. If a new rule is created, the new rule condition must be obeyed as well

harmonize_firing_items
procedure harmonize_firing_items(
p_crg_id in adc_rule_groups.crg_id%type
)

Helper to harmonize page items which are referenced by a rule at Tables.ADC_RULES.

Method extracts page item names from a rule condition using regex C_REGEX_ITEM.  Used to validate a rule condition and further application logic.

Parameter
p_crg_id
in adc_rule_groups.crg_id%type

Rule group ID

export_apex_application
function export_apex_application(
p_app_id in binary_integer
)
return clob

Method to export a requested APEX application

Parameters
p_app_id
in binary_integer

ID of the application to export

Returns

CLOB with the export script

integrate_rule_groups_into_app
function integrate_rule_groups_into_app(
p_crg_app_id in adc_rule_groups.crg_app_id%type,
p_rule_group in clob,
p_install_id in number
)
return clob

Helper method to include rule group export script into the application export.

Parameters
p_crg_app_id
in adc_rule_groups.crg_app_id%type

ID of the APEX application to integrate the rule group script into

p_script

Rule group script

p_install_id
in number

ID for the APEX supporting object install id

Returns

Script with the APEX export and rule group script integrated

validate_export_rule_groups
procedure validate_export_rule_groups(
p_crg_app_id in out nocopy adc_rule_groups.crg_app_id%type
)

Helper method to validate an export rule group according to the P_MODE request.  Based on the parameters passed in this method will export one or more rule groups.

Parameters
p_crg_app_id
in out nocopy adc_rule_groups.crg_app_id%type

APEX application ID of the application of which all rule groups are to be exported.

p_crg_page_id

If a rule group is copied, this parameter defines the target application page id

p_mode

Export mode. Determines which parameters are mandatory

Errors
APP_ID_MISSING

if <P_MODE> requires an application id

PAGE_ID_MISSING

if <P_MODE> requires an application page id

get_action_param_types
function get_action_param_types(
p_cato_id in adc_action_type_owners.cato_id%type
)
return clob

Method to retrieve all action parameter type scripts for the given action type owner.

If the requested owner is different from the default owner C_ADC then only those parameter types are returned which are not already defined within the core delivery.

Parameter
p_cato_id
in adc_action_type_owners.cato_id%type

Owner of the action parameter types

Returns

Install script with all API calls for the action parameter types for the requested owner

get_action_types
function get_action_types(
p_cato_id in adc_action_type_owners.cato_id%type
)
return clob

Method to retrieve all action type scripts for the given action type owner.

Parameter
p_cato_id
in adc_action_type_owners.cato_id%type

Owner of the action types

Returns

Install script with all API calls for the action types for the requested owner
